ol.li: Pricelist is in "inactive" state upon creation. Activate pricelist to use it
Upload a CSV file to populate items in the pricelist. The CSV template can also be downloaded using one of the action buttons.
The uploaded file can be downloaded then re-upload again to update the pricelist with the changes.
To create new price tags, go to the Product Price Tag menu.
For week related price tags, the date from and date to fields are required.

button.name: action_prod_confirm
button.confirm: Are you sure you have encoded the required data?
Are you sure you want to confirm the CLP?
button.name: action_confirm_clp

button.confirm: Are you sure you want to revert the status to SAP Generated for editing of Production Team?
button.name: action_revert_back
